content: Last night I did not sleep as terribly as I have the last week or so - since our spiritual activation has really taken off. But I sweat all night long, and have to change my shirt sometimes 3 or 4 times a night. It is so chilly in the room, in an effort to not sweat. We turned off the air last night, and I think we slept a bit better - but I do not understand why I continue to sweat so relentlessly
